div.h2: Carrier Claim Provider Assignment Indicator Switch

div.p: Variable indicates whether or not the provider accepts assignment for the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/asgmntcd
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-asgmntcd defines the following codes:

name.value: Carrier Claim Provider Assignment Indicator Switch

title.value: Carrier Claim Provider Assignment Indicator Switch

description.value: Variable indicates whether or not the provider accepts assignment for the non-institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/asgmntcd
